pages.text: Dobermans were originally bred as guard dogs, and still retain their protective natures today.$(br2)Standing just over a block tall, these loyal dogs come in five different coats.
These dogs are most commonly found in open spaces such as plains, savannas, and meadows. They can also be found in taigas and deserts, and more rarely in snowy plains.
pages.title: Location
Taming
pages.text: These dogs can be tamed with a Beef Treat.
